dt: {bc}the act or process of {a_link|consolidating} {bc}the state of being {a_link|consolidated}
{bc}the process of uniting {bc}the quality or state of being united
{bc}the unification of two or more corporations by dissolution of existing ones and creation of a single new corporation
{bc}pathological alteration of lung tissue from an aerated condition to one of solid {a_link|consistency}
{bc}the process by which a new memory is converted into a form that is stable and long-lasting

dt.t: Initially fragile memories can gain stability via {wi}consolidation{/wi}, but the extent to which sleep contributes to this process is unresolved …

shortdef: the act or process of consolidating : the state of being consolidated
the process of uniting : the quality or state of being united; specifically : the unification of two or more corporations by dissolution of existing ones and creation of a single new corporation
pathological alteration of lung tissue from an aerated condition to one of solid consistency
